```{r setup}
f <- file.choose()
data <- read.csv(f, header=TRUE)
# data[rows, cols]
data <- data[1:3,1:37] # if u remove secov. it would ve 1:38...
rownames(data) = data[,1]
data = data[,-1]

```



```{r heatmap}
data_norm = sweep(data, 2, colSums(data), "/")
data_norm = data_norm[,c(-30, -36)]
heatmap(as.matrix(data_norm))
```
